frontend.description:
Experience developing web applications for different clients, applying best practices, agile methodologies (Scrum) and responsive design.

 Main projects I developed/participated in:

trainee.description: Development of the internal project 'Skillscat' (skills catalog) integrating web, mobile and back-end.

moneyTrees.about: Website of a fictitious virtual bank created with ReactJS.

chatApp.about: A chat room application built with ReactJS and Chat Engine. To test, use the following accounts: Username: fulano / Password: 123123 ou Username: vinibatista / Password: 123123

shoppingCart.about: My first application developed with a combination of React and Typescript. A simple shopping cart.

explorix.about: A travel agency landing page using Gatsby.

reactQuizApp.about: Quiz App created with React and Typescript.

criptoTracker.about: Cryptocurrency research app built with Next.js.

websiteCreation.description: Development and maintenance of professional websites, web systems, blogs and online stores.

responsiveWebsites.description: Creation of responsive websites for the best viewing in all resolutions.

seo.description: Strategy and monitoring for your business, making your website appear increasingly better in searches.

contact.description: Want to get in touch? Contact me on any of the platforms.
